components.description:
The face of a baby with a small tuft of hair on top of its head. Some platforms show the baby sucking on a pacifier, and some platforms show a single tooth in the baby’s open mouth. Android previously displayed this emoji as a swaddled baby.

On Snapchat, the baby emoji signifies a new friend on the service. This emoji can also be used in the context of the meme “I’m baby.”

See also ðŸ‘¼ Baby Angel.

title: Baby

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Portrait and role symbols

emoji_net_data.name: baby

bn:00104589a: In the early part of life or growth.
In the early part of growth or life; born not long ago.
(used of living things especially persons) in an early period of life or development or growth
In the early part of growth or life.

bn:00007630n: A very young human being, from birth to somewhere between six months and two years of age, needing almost constant care and/or attention.
A very young human being, from birth to a year old.
Babies are the very young offspring of a human or other mammal.
An infant is the very young offspring of a human or animal.
A young child in the first years of life.
A very young human, particularly from birth to a couple of years old or until walking is fully mastered.
A baby or infant; a very young human or animal.
A very young child (birth to 1 year) who has not yet begun to walk or talk

bn:16201477n: The period of one's life in which one is a toddler
A toddler is a child between the ages of one and three.
A child between the ages of one and three

bn:00018345n: A pickpocket; a young or petty thief.
A piece or strip of potato that has been (usually deep-fat) fried and is commonly eaten with or as fast food.
A young person of either sex
A person not legally of age, or who is younger than may be charged with an offence
In law, a minor is a person under a certain age -- usually the age of majority -- which legally demarcates childhood from adulthood.
An account holder who is a family member, but not a parent, and who has limited use of the Internet. Children can view their own settings, but they can't change them.
A person who is too young to be considered legally competent according to the laws of a jurisdiction.
Age of majority, Legal age, Infancy
A person who is below the legal age of responsibility or accountability.
A person below the age of puberty.
A person who is below the age of adulthood; a minor .

apple_vendor_description: The baby emoji on Apple devices is depicted with a sweet, innocent expression and a plump, cherubic face. Its skin tones are rendered with soft gradients and gentle highlights, reflecting Apple's commitment to realistic and appealing character design. The overall impression is one of new beginnings, purity, and tender affection, often used to celebrate births, express nurturing feelings, or discuss family.
